skills.description: Developed innovative tools and features on a headless Shopify eCommerce web site and internal CMS platform.

testimonial.description: Sara is an exceptional engineer / developer, value creator and beloved team member. testimonial.author_designation: Founder, Chief Technology & Global Biz Dev at Cotopaxi

testimonial.description: I had the pleasure of working alongside and managing Sara for 2 and a half years. In that time, I was constantly struck by her willingness to learn, how quickly she picked up new skills, and how good-natured she is. Her role in the time I worked with her morphed from a junior front-end developer to a mid-level full-stack engineer, largely because she wasn’t afraid to tackle whatever was thrown her way. Early-on it was easy to recognize that she was willing and capable and that never changed in her tenure. I never heard her say no to anything new.She wasn’t afraid to ask for or offer help. And she became our resident expert on many-a-subject. Whether it was learning a new framework, re-structuring components, or deciphering ancient code relics, Sara was a rock-star. She is kind, funny, and easy-going and has become a dear friend. I loved working with Sara. And I genuinely hope I get the chance to work with her again some day.

Sara is an exceptional Full Stack Software Engineer whose curiosity and ability to tackle challenges head-first left a lasting impression on me. While collaborating with her at Cotopaxi, there truly was no task too large or too small for Sara, and she showed up every day with such positivity and joy! She brings a diverse set of skills to any project and is someone who is constantly looking to learn and refine her toolkit. I can’t say enough great things about Sara and any organization would be lucky to have her!
testimonial.author_designation: Information Technology Project Manager at Cotopaxi
